name: test_account_negative_scenarios[Meera Iyer]
description:
Test negative scenarios like Missing Fields.
    Uses 'accounts_api_manager' to authenticate, proving that even valid users
    cannot send invalid data (422 Unprocessable Entity).

parameters.name: row
parameters.value: {'tags': 'regression', 'scenario': 'missing fields', 'account_holder_name': 'Meera Iyer', 'dob': '1985-07-19', 'gender': 'Female', 'email': '', 'phone': '+91-9123456780', 'address': '45 Anna Salai, Chennai, TN', 'zip_code': '600002', 'account_type': 'Salary', 'balance': '85000.25', 'status': 'Inactive', 'services': 'Internet Banking', 'marketing_opt_in': 'false', 'updated_account_holder_name': 'Meera Iyer', 'updated_dob': '1985-07-19', 'updated_gender': 'Female', 'updated_email': 'meera.iyer@example.com', 'updated_phone': '+91-9123456780', 'updated_address': '45 Anna Salai, Chennai, TN', 'updated_zip_code': '600002', 'updated_account_type': 'Salary', 'updated_balance': '90000.00', 'updated_status': 'Active', 'updated_services': 'Internet Banking,Debit Card', 'updated_marketing_opt_in': 'true'}
